entry.title: Saturday: Chance of snow. Temperature steady near minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of snow late this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 30. Wind chill near minus 47. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Blowing snow. High minus 23.
